oneWireWeather
Class SensorConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  oneWireWeather.WeatherSensor
      oneWireWeather.SensorConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SensorConfiguration
extends WeatherSensor
implements java.io.Serializable

This class contains and allows maintenance of the sensor configuration for the wetaher station. It allows setting the ID's for the typical sensors, and also allows for additional sensors (such as additional temperature sensors). *

Author:
Seth Cohen
See Also:
